oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Survey of Bovine Viral Diarrhea Virus Testing in Diagnostic Labs in the United States from 2004 to 2005
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Driskell, E. A.
Ridpath, J. F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bovine viral diarrhea virus
BVDV
diagnosis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objectives of this survey were to determine the testing methods for BVDV commonly in use by diagnostic laboratories, percentage of laboratories that provide follow up information following positive BVDV test results and the impact of testing strategy on detection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2006; 304-305
